page.title: 14AGRICULTURAL AIDS-WENT HILLS
page.content: Between Darrington and Stapleton there is a crop sraying unit and a chemical supply depot,where farmers are able to buy the chemicals they need if they wish to carry out the spraying themselves. The crop spraying machines are used over a radius of about seventy miles, from Scarborough to South Nottinghamshire. They work on contract. Much of the spraying is of a certain kind of fertilizer, but they also spray herbicides and pesticides. Although Stapleton Park prefer to use tractor-drawn spraying equipment, this is not really possible when the peas have reached a certain height. In this case a helicoptor is used. We saw it spraying against aphids on the peas. A light plane is also used locally.
